email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the vessel OCEAN HARMONY available for your shipment of 12,000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. The vessel has a DWT of 85,000 and an LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for October 10-15, and the initial freight quote is USD 45/MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 42/MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 42/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Charterers
